```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
library(lubridate)
library(fpp3)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
stem <- read.csv("scbi.stem1.csv")
```

```{r}
avg_dbh<-stem %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dbh),!is.na(sp)) %>% 
  mutate(dbh_num=as.numeric(as.character(dbh))) %>% 
  group_by(sp) %>% 
  mutate(count=n(),
           avg_dbh=sum(dbh_num/count))
View(avg_dbh)
```

#barplot
```{r}
ggplot(avg_dbh,aes(x = factor(sp), y=avg_dbh)) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity',
           position=position_dodge())+coord_flip()
```
